validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validation.passwordComplexity: Password must contain both letters and numbers
validation.dateFormat: Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format
validation.dateFuture: Birth date cannot be in the future
validation.ageRange: Age must be between 10 and 100 years
validation.parentalConsentRequired: Parental consent is required for users under 18
validation.currentPasswordRequired: Current password is required to set a new password
validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validation.minAge: You must be at least {age} years old
validation.turnstile_required: Please confirm you are not a robot

auth.loginError: Login failed. Please check your credentials
auth.emailExists: This email address is already registered
auth.accountBlocked: Your account has been blocked. Please contact us

events.registerSuccess: You have been successfully registered for the event
events.cancelSuccess: Your registration has been successfully cancelled
events.cannotCancelSoon: Cannot cancel. The event is in less than 3 days
events.alreadyRegistered: You are already registered for this event
events.eventDraft: This event is not yet published

profile.deleteWarning: Are you sure you want to delete your profile? This action cannot be undone.
profile.deleteScheduled: Your profile will be deleted in {days} days. Your account is blocked until then.
profile.cannotDeleteRecent: You cannot delete your profile because you participated in an event within the last 28 days

gdpr.dataProcessing: I consent to the processing of my personal data in accordance with the privacy policy
gdpr.photoConsent: I consent to the taking and publication of photos and videos
gdpr.parentalConsentRequired: Since you are under 18 years old, we need your parents' consent
gdpr.deleteExplanation: According to GDPR, you can delete your profile at any time. Your data will be completely removed, except for the minimum required information for our reporting (name, participation dates). If you participated in an event within the last 28 days, deletion will be automatically performed after this period expires.

welcome.intro: We are pleased to welcome you to Berufsorientierung! Our goal is to support young people with a migration background in their career orientation.
welcome.howItWorks: Through our platform, you can register for various events and workshops. You will always receive a confirmation email with all important information.
welcome.closing: If you have any questions or suggestions, we are always here for you.

eventRegistration.confirmed: You have been successfully registered for the following event:
eventRegistration.cancellationInfo: If you cannot attend, please cancel your registration at least 3 days before the event through your profile.

eventCancellation.cancelled: Your registration for the following event has been successfully cancelled:
eventCancellation.reregister: You can re-register for this event at any time, as long as spots are still available.
eventCancellation.seeYouSoon: We hope to see you at another event soon!

eventCancelledByAdmin.notification: We regret to inform you that the following event has been cancelled:
eventCancelledByAdmin.apology: We apologize for the inconvenience and hope to welcome you at another event soon.
eventCancelledByAdmin.checkWebsite: Current and upcoming events can be found on our website.

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your internet connection
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later
errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again

events.title: Upcoming Events
events.subtitle: Discover our current career guidance opportunities

empty.title: No events available
empty.message: There are currently no scheduled events. Please check back soon!
